title: 2020 AUV 'Kirby' Documentation
summary: Welcome to the documentation for the 2020 Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (AUV) known as "Kirby" or "Charybdis", developed by the Kennesaw State University AUV team. This documentation provides a comprehensive insight into the design, construction, and operation of Kirby, offering a detailed overview of its electrical, mechanical, and software components.

title: 2023 AUV 'Empoleon Concept' Documentation
summary: Introducing the 2023 AUV, Empoleon, developed and built by the KSU AUV team. This documentation being updated as the project continues to grow.

title: 2016-2017 KSU AUV Team Constitution
author: Autonomous Underwater Vehicle Team at Kennesaw State University
summary: The official KSU AUV constitution used to identify and state a purpose at Kennesaw State University.

title: 2021-2022 KSU AUV Team Constitution
author: Autonomous Underwater Vehicle Team at Kennesaw State University
summary: The official KSU AUV constitution used to identify and state a purpose at Kennesaw State University.

title: Empoleon Phase 2 Concept Update 1
author: 2023 Secretary: Sean Schoenherr
summary: Notes regarding the design of project Empoleon which encases details over dimensions, materials, and structure.

title: 2023 Robosub Team Handbook
author: Robonation
summary: The official robosub team handbook which includes all the information needed to compete at the RoboSub competition. The handbook includes task descriptions, rules, and requirements, and other guidance and specifications.

title: Interview with Dante Orlando over AUV at KSU
author: 2023 President Dante G. Orlando | Meghan Cooper
summary: Meghan Cooper interviews the 2023 KSU AUV President Dante Orlando over his experience and thoughts as a member of the AUV team. Orlando shares his thoughts about his experience as well as what his favorite parts are.
